trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Cary
There were no other sightings in Cary on or around February 9th 2013
divs: Sighting Details2 of us were sitting on the back deck lest night when we saw an orange light that we thought at first was an airplane. But, as if flew over it just seemed more like a high altitude rocket. We could see flames shooting out the back of it. The object and the flames were both orange and bright. And, it moved in a straight path from north to south. It seemed pretty high in the sky, but much slower than meteors I've seen. We are both just trying to see how many people saw it. And, we'd love to know what it was.
Summary: Orange teardrop shaped object with flames seen moving slowly over night sky
